ResourceList.SERVICE_NAME:
select a.PMCode, a.ProjectCode, d.name as Name ,
(Select RoleName From Role Where RoleCode = c.RoleCode) as RoleName
from ProjectManagement a,
Team b,
TeamMember c,
Member d
where a.TeamCode = b.TeamCode
and b.TeamCode = c.TeamCode
and c.Account = d.Account
and a.ProjectCode = ?

DeepResult.SERVICE_NAME:
Select IFNULL(d.Conflict,0) as Conflict,
IFNULL(d.Passive,0) as Passive,
IFNULL(d.Overburned,0) as Overburned,
IFNULL(d.RoughWords,0) as RoughWords
From ProjectManagement a,
Team b,
Channel c left outer join DeepResult d on c.ChannelId = d.ChannelId
where a.TeamCode = b.TeamCode
and b.TeamCode = c.TeamCode
and a.ProjectCode = ?
